subject: Basketball
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Keith Brumbaugh does not want to hear the irrefutable numbers, that there are far more players on the court at the N.B.A. predraft camp than there are spots in the June 26 draft.
snippet: Keith Brumbaugh does not want to hear the irrefutable numbers, that there are far more players on the court at the N.B.A. predraft camp than there are spots in the June 26 draft.
